Interface JDBCPoolC3P0Provider

All Superinterfaces:

public interface JDBCPoolC3P0Provider extends JDBCPoolProvider<io.vertx.ext.jdbc.spi.impl.C3P0DataSourceProvider>, JDBCExtension.C3P0Extension
